string.text: Set of fully charged batteries. Very valuable and are in high demand due to constant lack of batteries in the Area.
Fully-used batteries. Besides weight in the inventory have no value.
a Disassembled servo, ready to mount on a vest.
Disposable kit allowing you to remove the servo from the suit.
This PDA belonged to Wolfhound, the leader of the group "Dogs". There are a lot of valuable information about the group of Mercenaries.
This PDA belonged to the Skull, the leader of the shock troops of the Duty. There are a lot of valuable information about the Duty faction.
This PDA belonged to a Mercenary Tyrant. There are a lot of valuable information about the impact of a group of Mercenaries in the Dead City.
This PDA belonged to the Mercenary Stuffed. There are a lot of porn. Dealers with hands it will take.
This PDA belonged to the Mercenary Master. Only the personal correspondence with someone from the Mercenaries.
This PDA belonged to the Mercenary Scar. Some routes, a lot of marks with her. Very valuable information.
PDA Valerian... Information of individuals to capture Dumps.
the Owner was Oleg Gusarov aka the Demon. Information on capture of the Cordon.
the laptop is Locked, there may be valuable information
Heavy. What's inside - is not known.
the PDA contains a map of Dark Hollow and a mark where a cache of documents.
Any drawings, calculations, maps. Nothing is clear, but documents are important.
Special medkomplekt, designed for special services in the Area. Includes all basic medicines.
